entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High plus 5 except 10 north of Cape Ray.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southeast 20 gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 in the Wreckhouse area in the afternoon.
